value.title: Revisiting a Power BI solution with Dynamic M Parameters
value.excerpt: Dynamic M Parameters for SQL are here in Power BI! YES!!! Let's revisit a Power BI solution and how we can take it to the next LEVEL using these!  LEVEL UP Power BI Conditional Drill with Paginated reports!  https://youtu.be/43CwBmaym8Q  Teo Lachev's Blog: https://prologika.com/power-bi-dynamic-m-query-parameters-reloaded/

value.title: Combining Tables in Power BI   Union Except and Intersect in DAX
value.excerpt: Power Query is often the engine used for combining data tables, especially using Merge or Append. However, sometimes, you might need to do that operation in DAX. An example of that is when you want to create that combination only virtually as part of a measure calculation that evaluates dynamically.

value.title: Introduction to end-to-end analytics using Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Discover how Microsoft Fabric can meet your enterprise's analytics needs in one platform. Discover the capabilities Fabric has to offer, understand how it works, and identify how you can use Fabric for your analytics needs.
